scripts.go:
npm run build
echo Running project...
node --unhandled-rejections=strict index.js
scripts.go-silent:
npm run build-silent
echo Running project...
node --unhandled-rejections=strict index.js
scripts.build:
clear
echo Prettifying code...
prettier --write .
echo Compiling JavaScript...
tsc --build --verbose
echo Compiling CSS...
sass --update --color .
echo Compiling HTML...
node ./server/build.js
echo Project built!
scripts.build-silent:
clear
echo Prettifying code...
prettier --write --loglevel silent .
echo Compiling JavaScript...
tsc --build
echo Compiling CSS...
sass --update --color . > /dev/null
echo Compiling HTML...
node ./server/build.js > /dev/null
echo Project built!
